list.name: Default
list.comment:
Toggle Server Version 2
Added an online update checker
Tested with Toggle 1.0.1

task.summary: HTPC Remote Server: Alpha 1 Version 0.1.0 Accepts mouse movement, clicks, scrolls and text strings. Tested with one server and one client on network. Tested with client Alpha 1 Version 0.1.0

HTPC Remote Server: Alpha 2 Version 0.2.0 Complete redesign of the ui and massive improvements to input controls Tested with one server and one client on network. Tested with client Alpha 2 Version 0.2.0

Toggle Server Alpha 3 Version 0.3.0 Added changeable server name and requirement that new devices be approved on server before they can take control Tested with one server and one client on network. Tested with client Alpha 3 Version 0.3.0

Toggle Server Alpha 3 Version 0.3.0
Adds Jar file
Tested with one server and one client on network. Tested with client Alpha 3 Version 0.3.0

Toggle Server Alpha 3 Version 0.3.1
Adds Jar file
Tested with one server and one client on network. Tested with client Alpha 3 Version 0.3.0

Toggle Server Version 2
Adds a system tray menu to exit easily and change settings
Tested with Toggle 1.0.1

Toggle Server Version 2
Fixed image not being accessible outside of source
Tested with Toggle 1.0.1

Toggle Server Version 2
Added an online update checker
Tested with Toggle 1.0.1
